code:
import axios from'axios';const api=axios.create({baseURL:process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5001',withCredentials:true});// Add a request interceptor to include the authentication token
api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token){config.headers.Authorization=`Bearer ${token}`;}return config;},error=>{return Promise.reject(error);});export default api;
